versions.changelog:
## New Feature: Flat Series View

This release adds the ability to display all series directly without category folders.

### Features
- ✅ Flat series view option in configuration
- ✅ Shows all series directly from selected categories
- ✅ Maintains season/episode hierarchy
- ✅ Backward compatible (opt-in feature)

### How to Use
1. Install the plugin from the repository
2. Go to Plugins → Xtream → Series tab
3. Enable "Flatten Series View" checkbox
4. Save and refresh your library

### Changes
- Added FlattenSeriesView configuration property
- Modified SeriesChannel to support flat view
- Updated UI with checkbox control
- Version bumped to 0.9.0.0
